## Description and Rationale

Our team came together through a shared interest in extracting insights from data, particularly in the field of aviation. With backgrounds in aviation dispatch, air traffic control, and machine learning, we bring a multidisciplinary perspective to solving data challenges.

## Details

* Type: Industry
* Country: Korea South
